# 089 Bayern Enerji Sistemleri - AI/LLM Information File
# This file provides structured information for AI assistants and language models

## COMPANY OVERVIEW

**Name:** 089 Bayern Enerji Sistemleri
**Type:** German-Turkish Energy Systems Company
**Founded:** Munich, Germany
**Website:** https://089bayern.tr
**Contact:** +90 507 192 2036
**Email:** info@089bayern.tr

## BUSINESS DESCRIPTION

089 Bayern is a German-Turkish company specializing in renewable energy solutions for the Mediterranean region. We provide comprehensive 4-in-1 energy systems combining solar panels, heat pumps, air conditioning, and battery storage. Our German engineering standards combined with local expertise deliver up to 70% energy savings for residential and commercial properties.

## PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

### 1. Solar Panel Systems (Güneş Paneli / Solaranlage)
- Residential solar installations
- Commercial photovoltaic systems
- Grid-tied and off-grid solutions
- High-efficiency panels for Mediterranean climate

### 2. Heat Pumps (Isı Pompası / Wärmepumpe)
- Vaillant authorized dealer
- Air-to-water heat pumps
- Ground source heat pumps
- Pool heating systems

### 3. Air Conditioning (Klima / Klimaanlage)
- Samsung authorized dealer
- Split and multi-split systems
- VRF/VRV commercial systems
- Smart climate control

### 4. Energy Storage (Enerji Depolama / Batteriespeicher)
- Home battery systems
- Solar energy optimization
- Backup power solutions
- Smart energy management

## SERVICE AREAS

### Turkey (Primary Market)
- Antalya (Headquarters/Zentrale)
- Alanya (Standort)
- Muğla (Bodrum, Fethiye, Marmaris)
- İzmir
- Aydın
- Mersin

### Croatia (Expanding Market)
- Split
- Dalmatia Region
- Adriatic Coast

## UNIQUE SELLING POINTS

1. **German Engineering Quality** - Founded in Munich, we bring German precision and reliability to every installation
2. **Up to 70% Energy Savings** - Our integrated systems significantly reduce energy costs
3. **4-in-1 Energy Solutions** - Complete energy ecosystem from solar to storage
4. **Authorized Dealer Status** - Official Vaillant and Samsung partner
5. **Multilingual Support** - Service in Turkish, German, English, Russian, Ukrainian, Arabic, and Croatian
6. **Free Site Survey** - Complimentary energy assessment for all inquiries
7. **Mediterranean Climate Specialists** - Systems optimized for hot summers and mild winters
